main event: Capt Govedake and Major Mancini observed an unusual object in Tipp City, Ohio on May 29, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as round or elliptical, The sighting lasted for 10-15 seconds, The observation was made through binoculars, One object appeared to have a green light, The light faded out after the sightings.
witness description: Capt Govedake, a physicist, and Major Mancini
